name: imanghafoori/laravel-smart-facades
description: Adds some features on the top of laravel facades

suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-widgetize: Gives you a better structure and caching opportunity for your web pages.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-decorator: Allows you to easily apply the decorator pattern in a laravel app.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-anypass: Allows you login with any password in local environment.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-masterpass: You can easily set a master password without code change.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-terminator: Gives you opportunity to refactor your controllers.
